name: @immonex/kickstart-elementor
description: Kickstart add-on for creating and embedding PDF/print expos√©s

scripts.clean: rimraf --glob 'src/assets/@(js|css)' && rimraf --glob 'src/skins/**/assets/*' && rimraf --glob build/* && rimraf --glob dist/*
scripts.build:del-scss-js-sources: rimraf --glob build/**/scss && rimraf --glob build/**/*.scss && rimraf --glob build/js && rimraf --glob build/skins/**/js
scripts.build:copy-informal-lang-files: dotenv cross-var 'for ADD_LANG in de_AT de_CH_informal; do cp -v build/languages/%PLUGIN_SLUG%-de_DE.mo build/languages/%PLUGIN_SLUG%-$ADD_LANG.mo; done'
scripts.build:zip: dotenv -- cross-var "mv build %PLUGIN_SLUG% && mkdir -p dist && zip -rq dist/%PLUGIN_SLUG%.zip %PLUGIN_SLUG% -x '**/.DS_Store' && mv %PLUGIN_SLUG% build"
scripts.build: npm run build:scripts && npm run build:copy && npm run build:clean-core && npm run build:clean-vendor && npm run build:clean-vendor-immonex && npm run build:del-scss-js-sources && npm run build:copy-informal-lang-files && npm run build:copy-formal-lang-file && npm run build:zip
scripts.pot: dotenv -- cross-var 'wp i18n make-pot --exclude=vendor,lib,assets,bin,data src src/languages/%PLUGIN_SLUG%.pot'
